textBox.richText: I loved teaching high school history, but it was exhausting for me because I wanted to do everything right. It was like swimming up river. I spent hundreds of hours searching for resources, collecting links and books and videos, and trying to find the best stuff I could. Here I have collected as many resources as I could find that are actually useful to the classroom history teacher. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated - please email me with them. Teaching - main topic page Teaching Tools & Downloads - sub-topic page Links for Portfolios Links for Puzzles & Games Links for Presentations & Lectures Links for Rubrics & Grading Links for Calendars & Assignment Trackers Links for Graphic Organizers Links for Tests & Quizzes Links for Making-Your-Own Site, Forums & Message Boards Links for Tools for Teachers Links for Printable Materials (Only two more teacher resource pages and there will be initial content on every teacher-related page!)
